title: Managing difficult behaviours
brief_description: A series of inservice training modules on behaviour management produced by the Developmental Disabilities Staff Development Unit of the University of New England specifically for intellectual disability residential care workers. Each module is accompanied by a training manual.
description: A series of inservice training modules on behaviour management produced by the Developmental Disabilities Staff Development Unit of the University of New England specifically for intellectual disability residential care workers. Each module is accompanied by a training manual.
